text: Chung Jae-won (born 21 June 2001) is a South Korean speed skater. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics and won a silver medal in the team pursuit event. As a result, Chung became the youngest Korean speed skater to win a medal at the Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:South Korean male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of South Korea Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in speed skating Category:Olympic silver medalists for South Korea Category:Speed skaters from Seoul
title: Chung Jae-won
